contentList.content: Dragon-like scales cover parts of your skin. When you aren't wearing armour, your base <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is 13 and you can add your Constitution modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier.

Bind your magic to a weapon for 1 Sorcery Point to become Proficient with it and it gains a +1 to attack and damage rolls.
At 5th level the cost increases to 2 sorcery points and you can make an attack with it as a bonus action after casting a spell.
At 10th level the cost increases to 3 sorcery points and the bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.

Bind to your main hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical and it gains a bonus to attack and damage rolls. You become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.
You can only have 1 bound weapon at any time.
The sorcerer bound to this weapon is always <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it. The weapon's damage is magical and it has a [1] to attack and damage rolls.
After casting a spell you can make a weapon attack as a bonus action.
